text:
Saefullah (11 February 1964 – 16 September 2020) was an Indonesian politician and educator. He was born in Jakarta, Indonesia. He was the Mayor of Central Jakarta from 2010 to 2014. He was also Regional Secretary of Jakarta from 2014 until his death.
Saefullah died on 16 September 2020 at a hospital in Jakarta from COVID-19, aged 56.
